data.name: InsertUpdateClan
data.value:
INSERT INTO clans(clan_id, name, description, exp_levels, badge, invite_type, total_trophies, required_trophies, wars_won, wars_lost, wars_tried, language, war_frequency, location, perk_points, win_streak, war_logs_public, entries)
VALUES(@ClanId, @Name, @Description, @ExpLevels, @Badge, @InviteType, @TotalTrophies, @RequiredTrophies, @WarsWon, @WarsLost, @WarsTried, @Language, @WarFrequency, @Location, @PerkPoints, @WinStreak, @WarLogsPublic, @entries)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), description = VALUES(description), exp_levels = VALUES(exp_levels), badge = VALUES(badge), invite_type = VALUES(invite_type), total_trophies = VALUES(total_trophies), required_trophies = VALUES(required_trophies), wars_won = VALUES(wars_won), wars_lost = VALUES(wars_lost), wars_tried = VALUES(wars_tried), language = VALUES(language), war_frequency = VALUES(war_frequency), location = VALUES(location), perk_points = VALUES(perk_points), win_streak = VALUES(win_streak), war_logs_public = VALUES(war_logs_public), entries = VALUES(entries)

data.name: InsertUpdateClanMember
data.value:
INSERT INTO clan_members(user_id, clan_id, role, troops_donated, troops_received, rank, rank_prev, new_member, war_cooldown, war_preference)
VALUES(@UserId, @ClanId, @Role, @TroopsDonated, @TroopsReceived, @Rank, @PreviousRank, @NewMember, @WarCooldown, @WarPreference)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_id = VALUES(user_id), clan_id = VALUES(clan_id), role = VALUES(role), troops_donated = VALUES(troops_donated), troops_received = VALUES(troops_received), rank = VALUES(rank), rank_prev = VALUES(rank_prev), new_member = VALUES(new_member), war_cooldown = VALUES(war_cooldown), war_preference = VALUES(war_preference)

data.name: InsertUpdateLevel
